meta.content: Welcome to the Cornwall Central School District, "Striving for Excellence Every Day". Located just five miles north of West Point Military Academy, Cornwall sits at the base of the beautiful Storm King Mountain.

div.p:
The Cornwall Central School District is committed to work together with the community to
provide a secure and nurturing environment of diverse learning opportunities for all students.
It is our goal to help students achieve their dreams and aspirations and to prepare them to
confidently face challenges while promoting strength of mind, body and character.

div.div: 24 Idlewild Ave., Cornwall On Hudson, NY 12520

p.font: As of April 16, 2020, Governor Cuomo announced that NY Pause would be extended through May 15. This extension includes the continued closure of schools. We are still awaiting the Governor's executive order for further details. As we learn more information, we will keep you informed.

span.b: It is important for each of us to follow the Department of Health guidelines by continuing proper social distancing and staying at home. This is the most effective safeguard against contracting and transmitting the COVID-19 virus. Please stay safe.

p.span:
Sincerely,
Neal Miller, Superintendent of Schools
